original_text: Soon afterward he went on through cities and villages, proclaiming and bringing the good news of the kingdom of God. And the twelve were with him,
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 각 성과 마을에 두루 다니시며 하나님의 나라를 선포하시며 그 복음을 전하실새 열두 제자가 함께 하였고

sentences.original_text: Soon afterward he went on through cities and villages
sentences.korean_translation: 얼마 후에 그는 여러 도시와 마을을 다니셨습니다

sentences.original_text: proclaiming and bringing the good news of the kingdom of God
And the twelve were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 열두 제자가 그와 함께 있었습니다
